S.FORM: saabaw makanaelre. kaykameane lri bulrua ku mitaane kay taleke ngkay ki Ngudradrekadhane swaveavedadhane.
saabaw makanaelre. kaykameane lri bolroa ko mitaane kay taleke ngkay ki Ngodradrekadhane swaveavedadhane.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的霧台魯凱語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today, I am going to teach you how to speak the Wutai Rukai language for food.

S.FORM: pualringalringaw su kay vaga ki sinsi?
poalringalringaw so kay vaga ki sinsi?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: sinsi, kainaku pualringalringaw. lri maka pelana su kawriva?
sinsi, kainako poalringalringaw. lri maka pelana so kawriva?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: kainaku maka kialalra, lri maka akuadrawana su?
kainako maka kialalra, lri maka akoadrawana so?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: ala dreela papia kay! tupaapalra ili kingivale silrigu.
ala dreela papia kay! topaapalra ili kingivale silrigo.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡!跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.
Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: sinsi, marimura ku iluku ku sapacapacasane.
sinsi, marimora ko iloko ko sapacapacasane.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: sinsi, marimura ku iluku ku sasupisupilrane.
sinsi, marimora ko iloko ko sasopisopilrane.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: ala kisalruana ki papalra su ku sasupisupilrane.
ala kisalroana ki papalra so ko sasopisopilrane.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: pakeakela ta kikay kaykameane, tamadreedrelenga lukabiibilrili ki amakapitulane.
pakeakela ta kikay kaykameane, tamadreedrelenga lokabiibilrili ki amakapitolane.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: lalaka ku ki palripilripi, sia Kaynwana ku.
lalaka ko ki palripilripi, sia Kaynwana ko.
S.TRANSL: I am the son of Palripilripi, my name is Kaynwane.

S.FORM: situa ku ki Arupu, sia Cangala ku.
sitoa ko ki Aropo, sia Cangala ko.
S.TRANSL: I’m a student at Arupu, my name is Cangale.

S.FORM: sia aneane ku nagane ki tama su?
sia aneane ko nagane ki tama so?
ku nagane ki ama sia Cangale.
ko nagane ki ama sia Cangale.

S.TRANSL: He is my brother, his name is Kalrimadraw.

S.FORM: sia aneane ku nagane ki lasu?
sia aneane ko nagane ki laso?
ku nagane ki lasusu sia Paidrisi?
ko nagane ki lasoso sia Paidrisi?
uunu, sia Paidrisi ku nagne ki lasu.
oono, sia Paidrisi ko nagne ki laso.
sia Takanaw ku nagane ki lasu?
sia Takanaw ko nagane ki laso?
ini, ku nagane ini sia Kucilru.
ini, ko nagane ini sia Kocilro.
ka alisu sia Lalui,ina ka betakane ki ina.
ka aliso sia Laloi,ina ka betakane ki ina.
kavay alisu laali ili, sia Legeane ku nagane ini.
kavay aliso laali ili, sia Legeane ko nagane ini.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Legeane。
She’s a friend of mine and her name is Legeane.

S.FORM: tarapinga ku caili ki tama su?
tarapinga ko caili ki tama so?

S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: tadrusa ku kaka ka sawvalay si ababay, tangea ku agili ka ababay.
tadrosa ko kaka ka sawvalay si ababay, tangea ko agili ka ababay.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.
How many people are in your family?
There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: manemane ku aungane ki tama su ka betakane ki tina su?
manemane ko aongane ki tama so ka betakane ki tina so?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: yakay ku aungane ki taka ka ababay?
yakay ko aongane ki taka ka ababay?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?
他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?
Yes, I'm from the Rukai tribe.
是，但是她是太魯閣族的。
Yes, but she's from the Taroko tribe.
Yes, we are all very tall.
Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: ku laagi ka sawvalay wathimgale ki vaga numi?
ko laagi ka sawvalay wathimgale ki vaga nomi?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?
Yes, they speak the ethnic language.
How many brothers and sisters do you have?
I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: taelre su ki tama su si tina su.
taelre so ki tama so si tina so.
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: unu, taelrea ku ki ama si ina.
ono, taelrea ko ki ama si ina.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: taerle su ki tumu su si kayngu su?
taerle so ki tomo so si kayngo so?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?
不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn't live with them.

S.FORM: taelrea ku ki ama, ina, kaka kasawvalay.
taelrea ko ki ama, ina, kaka kasawvalay.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.
你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: luka taibalribalrivane ki kaladralrangedrangane tara muabalriva ku.
loka taibalribalrivane ki kaladralrangedrangane tara moabalriva ko.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.
The sun is coming out, it's very hot.
Is it going to be cold outside?
It's cold, so wear more clothes.
今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: kadru ku emeeme belenge, ngiabualenga ka latariaw.
kadro ko emeeme belenge, ngiaboalenga ka latariaw.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: tawcekaceka ku udale, ngiabualenga ka vai, labalrilaulawnga.
tawcekaceka ko odale, ngiaboalenga ka vai, labalrilaolawnga.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: ngituatumane ku talikay musuane ku saseverane?
ngitoatomane ko talikay mosoane ko saseverane?
S.TRANSL: What's the weather like where you are?
We're going to have a big storm here.
Very well, out of the big sun.
I have to go to school.
The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: lri udale luasane, ngulringava iluku ku lenay.
lri odale loasane, ngolringava iloko ko lenay.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.
剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.
剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.
好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.
有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: waudaudale latadre, kainaku wailuku ku lenay.
waodaodale latadre, kainako wailoko ko lenay.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: maadraw ku valrigi, macaeme kay aulru li ki takuvalrigane.
maadraw ko valrigi, macaeme kay aolro li ki takovalrigane.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: maadraw kay vai, pakabithengelre ki aulru li.
maadraw kay vai, pakabithengelre ki aolro li.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.
I forgot to bring my pen.
I forgot to bring my chopsticks.
I don't have one either, let's go buy one.
Let's go buy a pen, shall we?
Well, I still have to buy erasers.
Let's go get breakfast, shall we?
No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: marimura ku palaw ku laulri ili.
marimora ko palaw ko laolri ili.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.
I forgot to bring my lunchbox.
那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!
What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: lri kanea ku ku kudrali ki gaku.
lri kanea ko ko kodrali ki gako.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.
What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: kaykameane! wailukaku kay bintu! tatadrusanga tukudrali!
kaykameane! wailokako kay binto! tatadrosanga tokodrali!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!
Let's go play basketball, shall we?
Please help me with the broom.
Okay, here's a broomstick for you.
Can you help me with the cloth?
I'm sweeping the floor and you asked Kalange to help you.
The floor is dirty, go clean it.
Okay, I'll go get the cloth.
那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.
等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.
I'm going to see my teacher.
What do you do after school?

S.FORM: lri tarudrusa nay ki talragi seasenay.
lri tarodrosa nay ki talragi seasenay.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: lri tarudrusa nay ki laali seasenay.
lri tarodrosa nay ki laali seasenay.

S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.
她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She's not here, what can I do for you?
Grandfather, I am Pangudrale, please open the door.
kariw, I'm Malrengana and I've come to play with you.

S.FORM: unu, mabarengera ku musuane. alabuala takalaelange!
ono, mabarengera ko mosoane. alaboala takalaelange!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let's chat!
Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: aw! mathariri ludreelane kikay lamadru ki angatu.
aw! mathariri lodreelane kikay lamadro ki angato.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很棒。

S.FORM: makawaaganga ka kwaubu kay ina. alabuala kanea!
makawaaganga ka kwaobo kay ina. alaboala kanea!
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!
Okay, I'll go wash my hands.
盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you're not an outsider.
I ate a lot, I'm full.

S.FORM: lrikatuasenga ku, naw kelanga dreele musuane.
lrikatoasenga ko, naw kelanga dreele mosoane.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，下次再來看你。
I'm leaving, I'll see you next time.
Yes, I will definitely come back to play again.

S.FORM: saabaw makanaelre.lri iluka ku numiane lrikape ki marudrange ki cekele.
saabaw makanaelre.lri iloka ko nomiane lrikape ki marodrange ki cekele.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去部落訪問耆老。
Hello everyone, today I’m taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: mathariri, lalri kibulru ta ki marudrange ku Ngudradreadrekadhane.
mathariri, lalri kibolro ta ki marodrange ko Ngodradreadrekadhane.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!我們要跟耆老說魯凱語。
Yes! We’re going to speak Rukai to the seniors.
Grandpa, we’ve come to see you.

S.FORM: anuka wathingale Ngudradreadrekadhane! ala mathariri turamuru!
anoka wathingale Ngodradreadrekadhane! ala mathariri toramoro!
S.TRANSL: 你們會說魯凱語啊!真是太棒了!

S.FORM: saabaw makanaelre, lri iluka ku mitaane mua ki babecengane kaungu kaykameane.
saabaw makanaelre, lri iloka ko mitaane moa ki babecengane kaongo kaykameane.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去小米田工作。
Hello everyone, today I will take you to work in the millet field.

S.FORM: buala takatilibi, pulringaava iluku ku rarukurukudru.
boala takatilibi, polringaava iloko ko rarokorokodro.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: unu, sinsi, makitua ilukunga nay kay rarukurukudru.
ono, sinsi, makitoa ilokonga nay kay rarokorokodro.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we’ve got our tools.
Not yet, it’s still far away.
You go get the bird catcher.
Okay, I’ll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: saabaw makanaelre, lri muata ki tawagulaguladhane.
saabaw makanaelre, lri moata ki tawagolagoladhane.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，我們今天要去動物園。
Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: ala kwini! Lripangutumane ta mua kavay?
ala kwini! Lripangotomane ta moa kavay?
S.TRANSL: 好棒喔!我們要怎麼去呢?
Awesome! How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: katiliba, lri langay ta ku kipu.
katiliba, lri langay ta ko kipo.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們準備買票。
Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: kay cucubungu laadhaadhame, ka lrilrikudru lawaudriudrupi, tangikakamani siavaava.
kay cocobongo laadhaadhame, ka lrilrikodro lawaodriodropi, tangikakamani siavaava.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.
It doesn’t matter, then you go and watch the birds.

S.FORM: lungilribatenga ki ngusivale ki tuki isiwlrita isarubu.
longilribatenga ki ngosivale ki toki isiwlrita isarobo.
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來集合。
We’ll be back in an hour.

S.FORM: wadreela ku ku makalra ku sulraw, si thathatha ku laadhaadhame.
wadreela ko ko makalra ko solraw, si thathatha ko laadhaadhame.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: wadreela ku ku makalra ku dulay, si thathatha ku laadhaadhame.
wadreela ko ko makalra ko dolay, si thathatha ko laadhaadhame.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: adradrava ili. Mabalrebalre kay drapale li.
adradrava ili. Mabalrebalre kay drapale li.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: tapangale kay yakay kay lredededepe langulanguy.
tapangale kay yakay kay lredededepe langolangoy.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: alrukulu kavay, taitalikay kikay laulanguy kamani.
alrokolo kavay, taitalikay kikay laolangoy kamani.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.
What kind of car did you take?
How do you go to church?

S.FORM: lri untingi ku ama sateatedre nakuane.
lri ontingi ko ama sateatedre nakoane.
ka lasu nguakay ki manemane lu mu gaku?
ka laso ngoakay ki manemane lo mo gako?
S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?

S.FORM: ka lasu ngukay ki cieyun mua gaku.
ka laso ngokay ki cieyon moa gako.
S.TRANSL: He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: ku kayngu su nguakay ki manemane lu langay ku lacenge?
ko kayngo so ngoakay ki manemane lo langay ko lacenge?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?
She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.
How are you going to get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: lri ngukayya ku ki varukuru mua Lanyu.
lri ngokayya ko ki varokoro moa Lanyo.
S.TRANSL: I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

S.FORM: ka lasu nguakay ki manemane mua Lanyu?
ka laso ngoakay ki manemane moa Lanyo?
S.TRANSL: How did he get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: ka lasu nguakay ki ngiapalay mua Lanyu.
ka laso ngoakay ki ngiapalay moa Lanyo.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

S.FORM: ka lasu nguakay ki manemane mua Takaw?
ka laso ngoakay ki manemane moa Takaw?
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?
He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: ka lasu ngukay ki kisia mua Taytungu?
ka laso ngokay ki kisia moa Taytongo?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: unu, ka lasu nguakay ki kisia mua taytungu.
ono, ka laso ngoakay ki kisia moa taytongo.
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: ka lasu nguakay ki kisia mua Taytungu?
ka laso ngoakay ki kisia moa Taytongo?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: ini, ka lasu ngukay ki ngiapalay mua Taytungu.
ini, ka laso ngokay ki ngiapalay moa Taytongo.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: kay nguadadeethe yakay ku tisiaba ki base?
kay ngoadadeethe yakay ko tisiaba ki base?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: unu, lu aru cucubunga lridreele su ku tisiaba.
ono, lo aro cocobonga lridreele so ko tisiaba.
S.TRANSL: 有，往前走就會看到公車站了。
Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: ku adeedethenga ki cieyun yakay taliinu?
ko adeedethenga ki cieyon yakay taliino?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的捷運站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: kadrua kikay ku cieyun kathaane ku takisi ku angukayyane su.
kadroa kikay ko cieyon kathaane ko takisi ko angokayyane so.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有捷運站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: lungukayyane ki base muagaku lri tarathainu ku zikange?
longokayyane ki base moagako lri tarathaino ko zikange?
S.TRANSL: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: lrika mangeale si lrima ki punkange daruru gaku.
lrika mangeale si lrima ki ponkange daroro gako.
lungukayyane ki kawti tarathainu si daruru Tayciw?
longokayyane ki kawti tarathaino si daroro Tayciw?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?

S.FORM: lrika vaeva ki tuki si daruru Tayciw.
lrika vaeva ki toki si daroro Tayciw.
S.TRANSL: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: lu nguhayyane mua Ulay maulay madu?
lo ngohayyane moa Ulay maolay mado?
S.TRANSL: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

S.FORM: lungukay su ki cieyun kela nayyanane lri tarathainu?
longokay so ki cieyon kela nayyanane lri tarathaino?
S.TRANSL: 你搭捷運來我家要多久?
How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?
Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: yakay k uvaeva ku utubay li.
yakay k ovaeva ko otobay li.
yai ini, kadrua ku thingale li.
yai ini, kadroa ko thingale li.
S.TRANSL: Don't, I don't know much about it.

S.FORM: lumakatukudra li yakay ku zikange su? ana mua ku kikawriariva amiamia ku?
lomakatokodra li yakay ko zikange so? ana moa ko kikawriariva amiamia ko?
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that okay?
Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: yakay ku zikange su luiya? naw kibuubulru ku abuubulru ki Ngudradrekay amia ku.
yakay ko zikange so loiya? naw kiboobolro ko aboobolro ki Ngodradrekay amia ko.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你關於魯凱族的傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I would like to ask you about the legends of the Rukai.

S.FORM: luiya lri mulregelrega ku, kai naku lriikay.
loiya lri molregelrega ko, kai nako lriikay.
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I'm going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won't be home.

S.FORM: makalra ku thingale ngukay ki sidruadrumane ki Ngudradrekay amia musuane, ana kibulrua ku la iya ku musuane?
makalra ko thingale ngokay ki sidroadromane ki Ngodradrekay amia mosoane, ana kibolroa ko la iya ko mosoane?
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對魯凱族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I heard that you know a lot about the traditional customs of the Rukai people.

S.FORM: kaika thainiinu ku thingale li, ai lri matikayya ku ku thingale li.
kaika thainiino ko thingale li, ai lri matikayya ko ko thingale li.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don't know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: lalri maka bilibila ku sasingi? lubibilrili apakaduadhane kiruku.
lalri maka bilibila ko sasingi? lobibilrili apakadoadhane kiroko.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: ala tarapianga ku caili su kikay?
ala tarapianga ko caili so kikay?
taramabangate si valru ku caili li.
taramabangate si valro ko caili li.

S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是魯凱族人嗎?
Is your wife also a Rukai?

S.FORM: wathingale su ku taipiane ku vaga?
wathingale so ko taipiane ko vaga?

S.TRANSL: 我會說魯凱語和排灣語。

S.FORM: kiaraaragadha ku kay takikawriavane li musuane, ala matikayyana ki taalualupane.
kiaraaragadha ko kay takikawriavane li mosoane, ala matikayyana ki taaloalopane.
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It's a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: ikatumane, saicengedenga ku taramulregelrega ku alupu.
ikatomane, saicengedenga ko taramolregelrega ko alopo.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: maelanenga, kay tabulruane su kaykameane matharirilringa turamuru.
maelanenga, kay tabolroane so kaykameane matharirilringa toramoro.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: kay tamatikayyane li kavagavagane turamuru, paucungulu ki cucungulane ka sapelaelaelane.
kay tamatikayyane li kavagavagane toramoro, paocongolo ki cocongolane ka sapelaelaelane.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: kay tamakakawrivane ta kaykameane pakeakela kikay. maelenenga turamuru kay tapakisupilrane su.
kay tamakakawrivane ta kaykameane pakeakela kikay. maelenenga toramoro kay tapakisopilrane so.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That's all for today's interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: lrikatuasenga ku, lukabiibilrilinga siadrama ku akilalalraneana ku makalra ku abuubulru.
lrikatoasenga ko, lokabiibilrilinga siadrama ko akilalalraneana ko makalra ko aboobolro.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I'm going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: saabaw, lri langay su ku manemane?
saabaw, lri langay so ko manemane?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: lri langadha ku ku vaeva ku kupu.
lri langadha ko ko vaeva ko kopo.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: saabaw, lri langay su ku manemane?
saabaw, lri langay so ko manemane?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: lri langadha ku ku veva ku talrupunu.
lri langadha ko ko veva ko talropono.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: lrilangadha ku ku kupu, kialangalangay numi?
lrilangadha ko ko kopo, kialangalangay nomi?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?
Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: kadrua, kai nay kialangalangay ku sabiki.
kadroa, kai nay kialangalangay ko sabiki.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.
How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: tabaadhay li ku akutulru ki lumase.
tabaadhay li ko akotolro ki lomase.

S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.
All the sweet potatoes are sold out.
I want to buy two bottles of oil.
We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: lu paralubay li langay ku batuku.
lo paralobay li langay ko batoko.

S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: lringupia su ki tingitingi ku batuku?
lringopia so ki tingitingi ko batoko?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?
I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: lri langadha ku ngudrusa ku kucay.
lri langadha ko ngodrosa ko kocay.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: tutulrunga kay yakay, naw baainga musuane.
totolronga kay yakay, naw baainga mosoane.
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: kikay yalumasane kay pagay lrika pia?
kikay yalomasane kay pagay lrika pia?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: elreelrenga mapusale si vaeva ka balrulane,anika mapuapusalenga ka balrulane.
elreelrenga maposale si vaeva ka balrolane,anika mapoaposalenga ka balrolane.
kikay mabangate si lrima ka balrulane.
kikay mabangate si lrima ka balrolane.
naw padriadrima, pakela ki iday ka balrulane.
naw padriadrima, pakela ki iday ka balrolane.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: paelreelrenga lrima ka iday si mangeale ka balrulane.
paelreelrenga lrima ka iday si mangeale ka balrolane.
kikay makucingalrenga, lri dulru aru pakaduayana?
kikay makocingalrenga, lri dolro aro pakadoayana?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?
不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.
I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: kikay bisikitu matulrulu ka balrulane,yakayyana ku murikay su?
kikay bisikito matolrolo ka balrolane,yakayyana ko morikay so?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: lridulrua ku kisaalru ku paysu musuane?
lridolroa ko kisaalro ko payso mosoane?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?
Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: kainaku wailu ku ku paysu, lri maka kisalruanana ku musuane?
kainako wailo ko ko payso, lri maka kisalroanana ko mosoane?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring the money, can I borrow money from you?
I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: marimura ku kaisipaysu, lri maka pakisaalru su nakuane?
marimora ko kaisipayso, lri maka pakisaalro so nakoane?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring the money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: inaku, kunakisalru su kaisu wasawlriana nakuane.
inako, konakisalro so kaiso wasawlriana nakoane.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: lri maka kisaalrua ku ku laimay su?
lri maka kisaalroa ko ko laimay so?
lri kisalrua ku ku hungu su?
lri kisalroa ko ko hongo so?
ala pakisalrua ili kwini lriilrikili su?
ala pakisalroa ili kwini lriilrikili so?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?
Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: waudaudalenga, kainaku sialenay, pakisalrua ili ku lenay su?
waodaodalenga, kainako sialenay, pakisalroa ili ko lenay so?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me one?
我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: kikay pakisalru su nakuane ku paaswalaala, lrisawlria ku musuane.
kikay pakisalro so nakoane ko paaswalaala, lrisawlria ko mosoane.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: naw silrigu ku hungu luiya su kawriavanga ili.
naw silrigo ko hongo loiya so kawriavanga ili.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: lri sawlriaku ku pasysu musuane luigane?
lri sawlriako ko pasyso mosoane loigane?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?
沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It's okay, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: luigane lrisawlri su ku paysu nakuane?
loigane lrisawlri so ko payso nakoane?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?
I'll return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: lrisawlri su luigane ku hungu li?
lrisawlri so loigane ko hongo li?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?
我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: kikay sapacapacasane pakisalru musaune ki Karausane?
kikay sapacapacasane pakisalro mosaone ki Karaosane?
S.TRANSL: Did Karausane lend you this pen?
Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: kikay sapacapacasane kisalru su ki Lavurase?
kikay sapacapacasane kisalro so ki Lavorase?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Karuku?
No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: kadruanga ku timu, lu kisalrua ki Muni.
kadroanga ko timo, lo kisalroa ki Moni.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Pailrape.

S.FORM: lu mua ki Paelrese ani sawlri nakuane ku paysu.
lo moa ki Paelrese ani sawlri nakoane ko payso.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Paelrese to give me my money back.

S.FORM: laka pia ku kiasalru ini muasune?
laka pia ko kiasalro ini moasone?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?
I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: makalra kay ubulu, waralaralaba ku, luasane lri puaciladha ku.
makalra kay obolo, waralaralaba ko, loasane lri poaciladha ko.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.

S.FORM: paraluba ili malra ku tatukunu si takaukaw li?
paraloba ili malra ko tatokono si takaokaw li?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: paraluba ili malra ku kwacuy si takaukaw li?
paraloba ili malra ko kwacoy si takaokaw li?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Put it next to the plow rake.
Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: tawmakabalrea ku, lri saabula ku luasane.
tawmakabalrea ko, lri saabola ko loasane.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.
你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: wamalranga madu kay kawlricay, kavay lasiasina kaiana ka amalraneana.
wamalranga mado kay kawlricay, kavay lasiasina kaiana ka amalraneana.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: waw! ani kaakalra kay kivurasi su?
waw! ani kaakalra kay kivorasi so?
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
(sighs) Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: paraluba ili pua ki taseketane ki pagay?
paraloba ili poa ki taseketane ki pagay?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?
We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.
魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.
How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: arakayya ku ku idiri esele ki kaange.
arakayya ko ko idiri esele ki kaange.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: arakay su ku lraili pana alupu?
arakay so ko lraili pana alopo?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: arakayya ku ku sadringadringadhane dringay, yakay lu ara kwanga ku si iluku ki taupungu.
arakayya ko ko sadringadringadhane dringay, yakay lo ara kwanga ko si iloko ki taopongo.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.
This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: kikay kapalre ki babuy, lakamani ku ulu ki babuy.
kikay kapalre ki baboy, lakamani ko olo ki baboy.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: kirimua dreele ku dringay ta, mia kaw paudringaynga ki bulabulay.
kirimoa dreele ko dringay ta, mia kaw paodringaynga ki bolabolay.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.
狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.
你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: kikay takebe ka tukulru, sapualraalrane ki ciici.
kikay takebe ka tokolro, sapoalraalrane ki ciici.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: kikay takebe ka tukulru, sapualraalrane ki tila.
kikay takebe ka tokolro, sapoalraalrane ki tila.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: sakatemane ka calrisi ka dringay, arakay nay pualra ki akece.
sakatemane ka calrisi ka dringay, arakay nay poalra ki akece.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: maelanenga lakisibulrubulru ku yabelenge, makalra kay pana ta kaykameane.
maelanenga lakisibolrobolro ko yabelenge, makalra kay pana ta kaykameane.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: unu, ta iluku mubalriw si pangisabulu.
ono, ta iloko mobalriw si pangisabolo.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: Maneane ku kauaungu ki tina su?
Maneane ko kaoaongo ki tina so?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: Manemane ku kauaungu ki tama su?
Manemane ko kaoaongo ki tama so?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: Ini, ka lasu talragi ki agili.
Ini, ka laso talragi ki agili.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.
No, she is my younger sister.
How many people in their family?
There are five people in their family.
How many children in your family?
There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: Tapia ku agi ku sawvalay ku ababay?
Tapia ko agi ko sawvalay ko ababay?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Kadrua ku sawvalay ku agili, tatulru ku labaibay ku agili.
Kadroa ko sawvalay ko agili, tatolro ko labaibay ko agili.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: Tapia ku taka ku sawvalay ku ababay?
Tapia ko taka ko sawvalay ko ababay?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?
I don’t have any older siblings.
How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Naw kangagnerece amia, laungula ku acilay.
Naw kangagnerece amia, laongola ko acilay.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: Naw kaculu amia, langula madu ku acilay.
Naw kacolo amia, langola mado ko acilay.
S.TRANSL: It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: Maadraw ka vai, madha karimurimuru ngiappalriili.
Maadraw ka vai, madha karimorimoro ngiappalriili.
S.TRANSL: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: Makalra ka emeeme, kadrua ku vai belenge.
Makalra ka emeeme, kadroa ko vai belenge.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: Luiya miakaw kadrua vai. makalra ku emeeme, maadraw ka valrigi.
Loiya miakaw kadroa vai. makalra ko emeeme, maadraw ka valrigi.
S.TRANSL: 明天好像沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: Lukatamulatadrane ta kivaavange lrikangituatumane ku vai?
Lokatamolatadrane ta kivaavange lrikangitoatomane ko vai?
S.TRANSL: 我們出遊那天天氣如何?
How’s the weather on the day we went out?
那天可能會冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: Luka taiabalribalrivane lrika ngituatumane ku vai?
Loka taiabalribalrivane lrika ngitoatomane ko vai?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: Luka taibalribalrivane lrika mathariri ka vai.
Loka taibalribalrivane lrika mathariri ka vai.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: Luka tamulatadrane ta kivaavange lri udale?
Loka tamolatadrane ta kivaavange lri odale?
S.TRANSL: 我們出遊那天會下雨嗎?
Will it be rainy on the day we go out?

S.FORM: Kikuini ku vai lrikathariri, kialu lriudale.
Kikoini ko vai lrikathariri, kialo lriodale.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，可能不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.
我們出遊那天會下雨嗎?
Will it be rainy on the day we go out?
Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: Yadrengerenga ku udale, muataluvaivaynga ka vai.
Yadrengerenga ko odale, moatalovaivaynga ka vai.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.
It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: Kadruanga ku udale, lumakmulringedele alaw lriudale, lamulatadrane sialenay madu.
Kadroanga ko odale, lomakmolringedele alaw lriodale, lamolatadrane sialenay mado.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後可能會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.
Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: Unu, luicaili ki kalakecelrane lrkakecelre turamuru, sikalukalra ku laimay.
Uno, loicaili ki kalakecelrane lrkakecelre toramoro, sikalokalra ko laimay.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.
Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: Unu, lukakaladralrangedrangane lrikaculu turamuru, paruakayya ungulu ku acilay.
Uno, lokakaladralrangedrangane lrikacolo toramoro, paroakayya ongolo ko acilay.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.
我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: Kainaku madalame, lukakalalidrarane makalra ku valrigi.
Kainako madalame, lokakalalidrarane makalra ko valrigi.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.
I forgot to bring the textbook.
I will share it with you.
I forgot to bring the eraser.
Do you forget to bring your pen?
Yes, can you lend me a pen?
What would you like for lunch?
What would you like for dinner?
What did you have for breakfast?
What did you have for lunch?
你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.
No, we have to carry books first.
Not yet. I am doing the dishes.
Did you rinse out your mouth?
Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.
Why didn’t you wash your hands?
I will wash my hands later.
What were you doing just now?
I went to meet the teacher.
What are you going to do after school?
What is she doing after school?
She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Kai yatavanane ku Aruay! Elrenga ku, manemane? lukelanga naw pelaelanga ki Aruay.
Kai yatavanane ko Aroay! Elrenga ko, manemane? lokelanga naw pelaelanga ki Aroay.
S.TRANSL: Aruay不在家耶!我是Elrenga，有什麼事嗎?回來我會轉告Aruay。
Aruay is not at home. I am Elrenga. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: Kayngu, kunay Alazumu si Alayumu, mueleba!
Kayngo, konay Alazomo si Alayomo, moeleba!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是Alazumu和Alayumu，幫我們開門!
Grandma, we are Alazumu and Alayumu, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: Basadha ku, wakela ku silape ki Ugusane.
Basadha ko, wakela ko silape ki Ugosane.
S.TRANSL: I am Basadha , I am here for Ugusane.
Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: Maulaynga su kaikela, mabarengera ku musuane.
Maolaynga so kaikela, mabarengera ko mosoane.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Alazumu, walela ku nay kivavange iya.
Alazomo, walela ko nay kivavange iya.
S.TRANSL: Alazumu, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: Kirimua mudaane, maulaynga ku tamukalavane li musuane.
Kirimoa modaane, maolaynga ko tamokalavane li mosoane.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: Kikay pauvurasi li, ani palalava kane!
Kikay paovorasi li, ani palalava kane!
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看!
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!
The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: Abuala! kikay duku li ka madru ki angatu, ani palalava kane.
Aboala! kikay doko li ka madro ki angato, ani palalava kane.
S.TRANSL: 過來!這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: Ala malimeeme kikay madru ki angatu na.
Ala malimeeme kikay madro ki angato na.
Ala nenea! kikay lredreke li kalapadhanane ani palalava kane!
Ala nenea! kikay lredreke li kalapadhanane ani palalava kane!
S.TRANSL: 請坐!這是我種的有機玉米吃看看!
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.
Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: Kainaku maka kane ku tianese, naw kane ku lringigu kamani.
Kainako maka kane ko tianese, naw kane ko lringigo kamani.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.
Sure, I like it very much.
Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: Maelanenga, kikay madru ki angatu ala tuaesebe turamuru.
Maelanenga, kikay madro ki angato ala toaesebe toramoro.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: Naw malra ku acilay paungulu musuane.
Naw malra ko acilay paongolo mosoane.
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.
Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: U! ala sangualreeme si kalimeeme lukaneane.
U! ala sangoalreeme si kalimeeme lokaneane.
S.TRANSL: Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.
Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.
I’ll make myself at home then.
Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.
我吃了好多，不能再吃了。
I ate a lot and couldn’t eat any more.

S.FORM: Lri iluka ku numiane mulregelrege kaykameane.
Lri iloka ko nomiane molregelrege kaykameane.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: Makalra ku tulaulaungu lregelrege amia ku ina.
Makalra ko tolaolaongo lregelrege amia ko ina.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子。
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: Lri iluka ku numiane muangaangade kaykameane.
Lri iloka ko nomiane moangaangade kaykameane.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.
Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: Lri iluku mitaane muababiabila ki drakerale.
Lri iloko mitaane moababiabila ki drakerale.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: Lri iluku mitaane mulregelrege ka sinisi.
Lri iloko mitaane molregelrege ka sinisi.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: Lri muata babiabila ki drakerale kaykameane?
Lri moata babiabila ki drakerale kaykameane?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: Ini, lri iluku mitaane mulregelrege ka sinisi.
Ini, lri iloko mitaane molregelrege ka sinisi.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.
Are we going to the mountains today?
不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: Sinisi, lri muata babiabila ki drakerale dreele ku manemane?
Sinisi, lri moata babiabila ki drakerale dreele ko manemane?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?
We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Lri mulregelrege ta dreele ku manemane?
Lri molregelrege ta dreele ko manemane?
S.TRANSL: Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?
We are going to see butterflies.
What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: Lri muangangade ta dreele ki paivaivay ku lapanay, la dradreela ki ababuungu si tumu!
Lri moangangade ta dreele ki paivaivay ko lapanay, la dradreela ki ababoongo si tomo!
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷!
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: Sinisi, lri mubabiabila ta ki drakerale languy?
Sinisi, lri mobabiabila ta ki drakerale langoy?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: Ini, lri dreele ta ki tharukaabisi.
Ini, lri dreele ta ki tharokaabisi.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Lri iluku mitaane muangaangade paivay ku lacenge ka sinisi.
Lri iloko mitaane moangaangade paivay ko lacenge ka sinisi.
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: Lri balre ta ku dae kaykameane.
Lri balre ta ko dae kaykameane.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: Taw dreela ku panianianiake ku tharukaabisi.
Taw dreela ko panianianiake ko tharokaabisi.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: Wa! madalama ku ki takulralrava, mathariri turamuru.
Wa! madalama ko ki takolralrava, mathariri toramoro.
S.TRANSL: Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.
Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: Ikayyanga kwini dredreele, madha katuatuase muadaidaili!
Ikayyanga kwini dredreele, madha katoatoase moadaidaili!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: Unu, kai nay lrikatuase mua ki taadailane?
Uno, kai nay lrikatoase moa ki taadailane?
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.
不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.
I want to see them right away.
How do you go to the block-house?
How does he go to the hospital?
How do you go to Penghu?
I go to Penghu by plane.
How do you go to Penghu?
I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: Ngua manemane ka Paelrese mua gaku.
Ngoa manemane ka Paelrese moa gako.
S.TRANSL: How does Paelrese go to school?

S.FORM: Ngua kisia ka Paelrese mua gaku.
Ngoa kisia ka Paelrese moa gako.
S.TRANSL: Paelrese goes to school by train.

S.FORM: Ngua manemaNe ka Kalrimadraw mua kiwkay?
Ngoa manemaNe ka Kalrimadraw moa kiwkay?
S.TRANSL: How does Kalrimadraw go to church?

S.FORM: Ngua lrilrikili ka Kalrimadraw mua kiwkay.
Ngoa lrilrikili ka Kalrimadraw moa kiwkay.
S.TRANSL: Kalrimadraw goes to church by bicycle.
Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: Ini, ngua baasa ku mua gaku.
Ini, ngoa baasa ko moa gako.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.
Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: Unu, ngua lrilrikila ku mua gaku.
Uno, ngoa lrilrikila ko moa gako.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.
Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: Unu, ngua kautia ku mua Takaw.
Uno, ngoa kaotia ko moa Takaw.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: Ngua kisia ngua ngiapalay su mua Taitu?
Ngoa kisia ngoa ngiapalay so moa Taito?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: Ngua ngiapaladha ku, mariaridare ki kisia ngukay ki ngiapalay.
Ngoa ngiapaladha ko, mariaridare ki kisia ngokay ki ngiapalay.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: Lu mua su kikway ngubaase ngiaungutingi su?
Lo moa so kikway ngobaase ngiaongotingi so?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: Ngia ungutinga ku mua kiwkay, masulialivate ki baase ngiaungutingi.
Ngia ongotinga ko moa kiwkay, masolialivate ki baase ngiaongotingi.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.
Is the market close to your house?
不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.
Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: Adeethe, tinua daadavace madu si mua.
Adeethe, tinoa daadavace mado si moa.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.
Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: Sana mulatadrane tisiaba daadavace ka lrima pungukange si daruru.
Sana molatadrane tisiaba daadavace ka lrima pongokange si daroro.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.
I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: Yakay ku aungane li kainaku lri itavanane. Lukakaiyaiyanga.
Yakay ko aongane li kainako lri itavanane. Lokakaiyaiyanga.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家。改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: Luiya yakay ku zikange su? Naw kelanga lumakumulringedele.
Loiya yakay ko zikange so? Naw kelanga lomakomolringedele.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.
Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Lri maka bilibila ku? Naw pacase amia ku.
Lri maka bilibila ko? Naw pacase amia ko.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.
Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: Kainaku matahriri, lakaika nilripethelane ka taseketane, palrainga.
Kainako matahriri, lakaika nilripethelane ka taseketane, palrainga.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.
Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: Maelanenga lapakela su nakuane lrikape musuane.
Maelanenga lapakela so nakoane lrikape mosoane.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: Kaimatuamen, lri kivavaa su ku manemane?
Kaimatoamen, lri kivavaa so ko manemane?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?
請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?
我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.
Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: Ku lalake su mialri ikaykay cekele?
Ko lalake so mialri ikaykay cekele?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: Ini, ku lalakeli yakay cekele talidratane.
Ini, ko lalakeli yakay cekele talidratane.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.
Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: Yakay ku lapulapuli ku vaeva ku taupungu si vaeva ka adhaadhame, mialri lini ka wacekecekele li.
Yakay ko lapolapoli ko vaeva ko taopongo si vaeva ka adhaadhame, mialri lini ka wacekecekele li.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: Mialri lapua ku ku vaeva ku ngiaw, laikay kay lawaudriudripi kaidu tasepele.
Mialri lapoa ko ko vaeva ko ngiaw, laikay kay lawaodriodripi kaido tasepele.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: Naw kiavavaga ku nguakay ki nitutaulrisiane ki waalupu.
Naw kiavavaga ko ngoakay ki nitotaolrisiane ki waalopo.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: Kaika thainiinu ku thingale li, ai ku amaka tubalreane li lritara tubalrea ku musuane.
Kaika thainiino ko thingale li, ai ko amaka tobalreane li lritara tobalrea ko mosoane.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: Ku rarukurukudru ki waalupu manemane ku nitutaulrisiane?
Ko rarokorokodro ki waalopo manemane ko nitotaolrisiane?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: Ku saalualupane kaimaka sulrape ku labaibay.
Ko saaloalopane kaimaka solrape ko labaibay.
S.TRANSL: 打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: Kavay ababay lri maka tupalra alupu?
Kavay ababay lri maka topalra alopo?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?
不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Karausane, kadrunga ku masikaw, lulangadha ku masikaw.
Karaosane, kadronga ko masikaw, lolangadha ko masikaw.
S.TRANSL: Karausane，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Karausane, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: Yakayyana ku akuvaevanga ikay taagaagane, asilangayana!
Yakayyana ko akovaevanga ikay taagaagane, asilangayana!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!
一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: Lrl langadhaku ku masikaw, kialangalangay numi?
Lrl langadhako ko masikaw, kialangalangay nomi?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?
Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: Lri nguakudrusa ku langay, si akuvaeva ki lumase ku pagay.
Lri ngoakodrosa ko langay, si akovaeva ki lomase ko pagay.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: Yakay kay pagay, manemaneana ku murikay su?
Yakay kay pagay, manemaneana ko morikay so?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: Lri langadhaku ku batuku, yakay numianane?
Lri langadhako ko batoko, yakay nomianane?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?
I want to buy some clothes.
What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: Lri langadhaku ku edreedrekane ku alrimane.
Lri langadhako ko edreedrekane ko alrimane.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: Yakay ka lraularpungu si saleseese nay.
Yakay ka lraolarpongo si saleseese nay.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: Ala baadhaili ku saleseese ku laimay.
Ala baadhaili ko saleseese ko laimay.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Kalrasingane muainu su kuasane? Waungudu su?
Kalrasingane moaino so koasane? Waongodo so?
S.TRANSL: Kalrasingane你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Kalrasingane, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: Ini, paraluba ku ki kaingu langay ku lacenge.
Ini, paraloba ko ki kaingo langay ko lacenge.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: Iya, yakay ku zikange su lumaungu? lrikela su kibalrulu nakuane.
Iya, yakay ko zikange so lomaongo? lrikela so kibalrolo nakoane.
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: Ini, lri langadha ku ku laimay.
Ini, lri langadha ko ko laimay.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.
Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: Saabaw, kikay ereerece kay lacenge twapiapia?
Saabaw, kikay ereerece kay lacenge twapiapia?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: Ku ereerece ku lacenge mapusale ka balrulane.
Ko ereerece ko lacenge maposale ka balrolane.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.
How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: Kay vurasi ku vaeva kingi matulrulu ka balrulane.
Kay vorasi ko vaeva kingi matolrolo ka balrolane.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: Ala baadhaili ku drusa ka ereerece ku lacenge si vaeva kingi ka vurasi.
Ala baadhaili ko drosa ka ereerece ko lacenge si vaeva kingi ka vorasi.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Kui, marimura ku ku sapacapacasane, lri maka pakisaalruanana su nakuane?
Koi, marimora ko ko sapacapacasane, lri maka pakisaalroanana so nakoane?
S.TRANSL: Kui，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Kui, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?
I don’t have one either. This is Paduay’s.

S.FORM: Lai pakisaalru su nakuane padalruana? Lri padalruaku si saulri musuane.
Lai pakisaalro so nakoane padalroana? Lri padalroako si saolri mosoane.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.
Thank you and thank Pidhuay for me.

S.FORM: Lri saulria ku kay drusa kay hungu.
Lri saolria ko kay drosa kay hongo.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.
No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: Lri kisaalruana naku ku tulru ku hungu.
Lri kisaalroana nako ko tolro ko hongo.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: Mathariringa. tarangulringava si kela saulri lumakatulrulunga.
Mathariringa. tarangolringava si kela saolri lomakatolrolonga.
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: Kai su wasaulriana ku sasupisupilrane li.
Kai so wasaolriana ko sasopisopilrane li.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.
那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?
Did you lend it to Kalravuane?

S.FORM: Kai naku wathingale. Lu kivaga ki alisu.
Kai nako wathingale. Lo kivaga ki aliso.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.
I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Pangudrale, kikay sapakabelengane pakisaalru musane ki Karuku?
Pangodrale, kikay sapakabelengane pakisaalro mosane ki Karoko?
S.TRANSL: Pangudrale, did Karuku lend you this coat?

S.FORM: Ini, kikay langay ki ina si baai nakuane.
Ini, kikay langay ki ina si baai nakoane.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: Ka sapakabelengane ki Karuku maramaw ki musuane.
Ka sapakabelengane ki Karoko maramaw ki mosoane.
S.TRANSL: Karuku’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: Ka sapakabelengane ki lasu iceecelrenge, makaela ku kulaw nay.
Ka sapakabelengane ki laso iceecelrenge, makaela ko kolaw nay.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Pelelresane, kiasaalru su ki Kulele ku paysu?
Pelelresane, kiasaalro so ki Kolele ko payso?
S.TRANSL: Pelelresane, did you borrow money from Kulele?

S.FORM: Unu, nayka wasaulria ku iniane kaykameane, kainaku siapaysu.
Uno, nayka wasaolria ko iniane kaykameane, kainako siapayso.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.
Then, when will you return the money?
I will return to him tomorrow.
Okay, I will tell Kulele for you.

S.FORM: Kay ciici arakay ku takebe tukulru, kay tikuray arakay ku dringay, pacengecenge pia kikay.
Kay ciici arakay ko takebe tokolro, kay tikoray arakay ko dringay, pacengecenge pia kikay.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: Anika pangimia kikay, tapasamaliane li! Tharepane kakadrua ku makapualraalra.
Anika pangimia kikay, tapasamaliane li! Tharepane kakadroa ko makapoalraalra.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: Naw bulruana musuane darepe kikay drusa ka satukutukulrane.
Naw bolroana mosoane darepe kikay drosa ka satokotokolrane.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: Mathariri! ala mathariri turamuru! lubiibilrili lrimaka pualranga ku labulabulay.
Mathariri! ala mathariri toramoro! lobiibilrili lrimaka poalranga ko labolabolay.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: Maelrengenga ka ubulu angaangade, lu mua taseketane malra ku takaukaw, ila tangudalrane.
Maelrengenga ka obolo angaangade, lo moa taseketane malra ko takaokaw, ila tangodalrane.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: Yakay ki thiili ki cepenge ki tapavaivaiyane ki taleke, sana mudaane su ki taseketane lri dreele su.
Yakay ki thiili ki cepenge ki tapavaivaiyane ki taleke, sana modaane so ki taseketane lri dreele so.
S.TRANSL: 在穀物乾燥簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: Drareela malra, madha kaduladula. Marangisi turamuru kwini takaukaw.
Drareela malra, madha kadoladola. Marangisi toramoro kwini takaokaw.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷。鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: Ku tukulru li yatailebe kavay ki angatu.
Ko tokolro li yatailebe kavay ki angato.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: Patuathingala ku pikay kikay, wathingala ku ka yatalikay inu ku tukulru li.
Patoathingala ko pikay kikay, wathingala ko ka yatalikay ino ko tokolro li.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: Kikay rumuku, pikay nay ki babiabila ki drakerale si purumukane ki kaange.
Kikay romoko, pikay nay ki babiabila ki drakerale si poromokane ki kaange.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: Kadrua ku rumuku nay kay, arakay nay ku salrakuikuilane tukaange.
Kadroa ko romoko nay kay, arakay nay ko salrakoikoilane tokaange.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: Kai naku arakayyana ku salrakuikuilane, lubiibilrili bulruangaili midra?
Kai nako arakayyana ko salrakoikoilane, lobiibilrili bolroangaili midra?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?
好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: Naw bulrunga musuane ku tadaredarepane ku rumuku ki kaange.
Naw bolronga mosoane ko tadaredarepane ko romoko ki kaange.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: Ngiavevele kwini salrakuikuilane su, alaw muakailanenga ku kaange! kirimua malra bilibili.
Ngiavevele kwini salrakoikoilane so, alaw moakailanenga ko kaange! kirimoa malra bilibili.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: Idrengerana, walukalukay turamuru kay varukuru. Naw sakay kay kikay bilibili.
Idrengerana, walokalokay toramoro kay varokoro. Naw sakay kay kikay bilibili.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: Malra bilibili papia nakuane. Naw paralubu musuane bilibili.
Malra bilibili papia nakoane. Naw paralobo mosoane bilibili.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: Ala mathariri turamuru! pangiaesay kaykameane, suaeteane kay rumuku ki kaange.
Ala mathariri toramoro! pangiaesay kaykameane, soaeteane kay romoko ki kaange.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: Ila takirarimu mubalriw si pangisabulu mitaane.
Ila takirarimo mobalriw si pangisabolo mitaane.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: Kaykameane lri bulrua ku numiane ki lawaudriudripi Ngudradreadrekadhane.
Kaykameane lri bolroa ko nomiane ki lawaodriodripi Ngodradreadrekadhane.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的魯凱語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Ngudradrekay language today.

S.FORM: Kaykameane lri bulrua ku numiane ki lawacebecebe Ngudradreadrekadhane.
Kaykameane lri bolroa ko nomiane ki lawacebecebe Ngodradreadrekadhane.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的魯凱語怎麼說。

S.FORM: Kaykameane lri bulrua ku numiane ki lamadru ki angatu Ngudradreadrekadhane.
Kaykameane lri bolroa ko nomiane ki lamadro ki angato Ngodradreadrekadhane.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的魯凱語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in Ngudradrekay language today.
Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.
Share the book with your classmate next to you.
I will lend you my eraser.
我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.
我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: Saabaw makanaelre, ku nagane li sia Cangale.
Saabaw makanaelre, ko nagane li sia Cangale.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Cangale.

S.FORM: Saabw makanaelre, ku nagane li sia Arupu.
Saabw makanaelre, ko nagane li sia Aropo.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Arupu.

S.FORM: Agiaku ki Ivay, ku nagane li sia Avusu.
Agiako ki Ivay, ko nagane li sia Avoso.
S.TRANSL: 我是Ivay的妹妹，我的名字是Avusu。
I am Ivay’s sister. My name is Avusu.

S.FORM: Sinisi li ki lasu, sia Lumane.
Sinisi li ki laso, sia Lomane.
Ka lasu kaka, ka lasu sia Kakurumane.
Ka laso kaka, ka laso sia Kakoromane.
Sianeane ku nagane ki taka ka ababay?
Sianeane ko nagane ki taka ka ababay?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: Ku nagane ki kaka sia Avusu.
Ko nagane ki kaka sia Avoso.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Avusu.

S.FORM: Siaanena ku angane ki agi ka ababay?
Siaanena ko angane ki agi ka ababay?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: Sia Pelrese ku nagane ki agili ka ababay.
Sia Pelrese ko nagane ki agili ka ababay.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Pelrese.

S.FORM: Wathingale su ku nagane ki lasu?
Wathingale so ko nagane ki laso?
Tarapianga ku caili ki taka ka sawvalay kaiciali?
Tarapianga ko caili ki taka ka sawvalay kaiciali?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: Tarapianga ku caili ki agi ka sawvalay kaicaili?
Tarapianga ko caili ki agi ka sawvalay kaicaili?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: Yakay ku gaku ki cekele numi?
Yakay ko gako ki cekele nomi?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?
你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: Unu, ikay nay gaku mia nay ki wacekecekele.
Uno, ikay nay gako mia nay ki wacekecekele.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: Madha kivavavangeana, Kirimua mua ki taetale nene.
Madha kivavavangeana, Kirimoa moa ki taetale nene.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: Kaykameane Kingi ka Vai, luiya tatelradhane, ila tamulatadre kivaavange!
Kaykameane Kingi ka Vai, loiya tatelradhane, ila tamolatadre kivaavange!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!
Great! Let’s go to the riverside.
What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: Luiya Acilay ka Vai, luiya tangimalri!
Loiya Acilay ka Vai, loiya tangimalri!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: Luiya lumiamialre manemane ku atumanane su?
Loiya lomiamialre manemane ko atomanane so?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: Luiya Vai ki Vai, kunaku si ina lri mukiwkay nay.
Loiya Vai ki Vai, konako si ina lri mokiwkay nay.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.
I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.
老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.
May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: Lripadalrunga si paalikay kay takibulruane, idrengerana.
Lripadalronga si paalikay kay takibolroane, idrengerana.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.
老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.
Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: Sinisi lrikivagaku luka Vai ki Dramare, lrikisulravaku.
Sinisi lrikivagako loka Vai ki Dramare, lrikisolravako.
S.TRANSL: 老師我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.
She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: Sinisi, macaeme ku lrulrungu ki Kaynuane, kiavaga kaykameane.
Sinisi, macaeme ko lrolrongo ki Kaynoane, kiavaga kaykameane.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Kaynuane has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: Kanaku sia Rathudu Rusudramane, taramangealenga ku cailili kaycaili.
Kanako sia Rathodo Rosodramane, taramangealenga ko cailili kaycaili.
S.TRANSL: My name is Rathudu Rusudramane, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: Suainu su ka zuku ka vavalake?
Soaino so ka zoko ka vavalake?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?
你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?
是的，我們全家都是日峐族人。
Yes, my whole family is Drekay.
你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Ini, Drekay ku ama, kapairangane ku ina.
Ini, Drekay ko ama, kapairangane ko ina.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是日峐族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Drekay, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: Kavay tama su? tarapianga ku caili ini?
Kavay tama so? tarapianga ko caili ini?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Kavay tama su? tarapianga ku caili ini?
Kavay tama so? tarapianga ko caili ini?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Ini, marudrange ki cekelenay, taramavalrulunga ku caili ini.
Ini, marodrange ki cekelenay, taramavalrolonga ko caili ini.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: Tarapianga ku caili ki taka ka sawvalay?
Tarapianga ko caili ki taka ka sawvalay?
Ku kaka ka sawvalay taramangealenga si valru ku caili.
Ko kaka ka sawvalay taramangealenga si valro ko caili.
Madraadraw musuane ku caili ki taka?
Madraadraw mosoane ko caili ki taka?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?
好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: Uunu, wamuanganaku ki iday si matulrulu kunguvenge.
Uono, wamoanganako ki iday si matolrolo kongovenge.

S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.
He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: Yakay talangulangudhane, lrikikalrumale luasane ka lasu.
Yakay talangolangodhane, lrikikalromale loasane ka laso.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: Yainu ku Pianiw? lrikikalrumale lrabuale luasane ka alisu.
Yaino ko Pianiw? lrikikalromale lraboale loasane ka aliso.
S.TRANSL: Pianiw在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Pianiw? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: Yakay ki tatulrisisisiane, naw mua daulu iniane.
Yakay ki tatolrisisisiane, naw moa daolo iniane.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.
Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: Naw langadhana ku kudrali, luasanenga lrisilapengaku musuane.
Naw langadhana ko kodrali, loasanenga lrisilapengako mosoane.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.
Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: Lu silapa ki druma, lrisilapaku ki sinisi.
Lo silapa ki droma, lrisilapako ki sinisi.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: Ka Palripilripi lrikikalrumale ki wapangulru ki malri kaykameane?
Ka Palripilripi lrikikalromale ki wapangolro ki malri kaykameane?
S.TRANSL: Is Palripilripi competing in croquet today?
No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: Luka taungudukadhane lrikipaelre su ki kiakalrumale?
Loka taongodokadhane lrikipaelre so ki kiakalromale?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?
運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?
我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?
We will compete in tug of war.
我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: Ini, lrikilangayta ku gumu ka malri.
Ini, lrikilangayta ko gomo ka malri.
Wamalra su ku icibange, maparamuru su!
Wamalra so ko icibange, maparamoro so!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!
Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.
不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: Yakay ki nikay, lu mubelenga silape iniane.
Yakay ki nikay, lo mobelenga silape iniane.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: Arupu su, maulaynga kaidredreele musuane, su?
Aropo so, maolaynga kaidredreele mosoane, so?
S.TRANSL: 是Arupu阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Arupu. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?
I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.
他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.
She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: Kaiyatavanane ku tumu numi, yaangaangade, ikayya kay mukalava lumubalriw.
Kaiyatavanane ko tomo nomi, yaangaangade, ikayya kay mokalava lomobalriw.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.
I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.
It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: Kikay abaadhane numiane ka pangudrale pupingisiangana..
Kikay abaadhane nomiane ka pangodrale popingisiangana..
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: Maulay kaikelakela, wadaulaku mitaane kabalrulu kay aga.
Maolay kaikelakela, wadaolako mitaane kabalrolo kay aga.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: Palrainga nauungulu ku ucia, tamukadaanane kalaelange.
Palrainga naoongolo ko ocia, tamokadaanane kalaelange.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.
謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: Kikay tauculuculuane kay kuku, iluka si ngiabababalay kane.
Kikay taocolocoloane kay koko, iloka si ngiabababalay kane.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: Kiadredreelaku musuane luiya ki miauaubu ku amadradreelaneta.
Kiadredreelako mosoane loiya ki miaoaobo ko amadradreelaneta.
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?
我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: Tamua siwkaiziw kamani midra, lringiragelanaku ku Ngudradrekadhane.
Tamoa siwkaiziw kamani midra, lringiragelanako ko Ngodradrekadhane.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: Ngiaesadhane ku sakera ki cekelenay. lukakalapuupuanenga kela silape nakuane.
Ngiaesadhane ko sakera ki cekelenay. lokakalapoopoanenga kela silape nakoane.
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!
那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?
那你豐年祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Harvest Festival!
Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: Asu kirimu nawsiwlri mubalriw cekecekele iya?
Aso kirimo nawsiwlri mobalriw cekecekele iya?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?
I want to return to teach at the local school.
Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: Mavalringivaku ki cekeleli, sidrama ku adulruanli pangibilri ki cekeleli.
Mavalringivako ki cekeleli, sidrama ko adolroanli pangibilri ki cekeleli.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: Malrigili su tinunu, aneane ku wabulru musuane?
Malrigili so tinono, aneane ko wabolro mosoane?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: Kaingu, amani ku malrilrigilinga ikay ki cekelenay ka taratinunu.
Kaingo, amani ko malrilrigilinga ikay ki cekelenay ka taratinono.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: Asu nau kiburlu ki tatinutinunane iya?
Aso nao kiborlo ki tatinotinonane iya?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: Bungukanay kikay watinunu, nau paucungulu kay bunguka amiaku.
Bongokanay kikay watinono, nao paocongolo kay bongoka amiako.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: Malrigili su turamuru, kikay lripakaulay madu?
Malrigili so toramoro, kikay lripakaolay mado?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: Mathariri ku pataratulru ki dramare pakaangu lasangulreeme.
Mathariri ko pataratolro ki dramare pakaango lasangolreeme.
S.TRANSL: 可以放三個月之久使它發酵醇香。
It can be left to ferment for up to three months.

S.FORM: Yakay kay kamangulu si kucayli, dukuli patuelre.
Yakay kay kamangolo si kocayli, dokoli patoelre.
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: Paelrelrenga drusa ka iday si malrimale ka balrulane.
Paelrelrenga drosa ka iday si malrimale ka balrolane.
Madalamaku kikay laimay kay, pia ku paisu?
Madalamako kikay laimay kay, pia ko paiso?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: Kikay yai lrima ka iday ka balrulane.
Kikay yai lrima ka iday ka balrolane.

S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?
No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: Iya! lrimalraku ku vaeva ku icecelrenge ku laimay.
Iya! lrimalrako ko vaeva ko icecelrenge ko laimay.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.
我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: Paelrelrenga drusa ka kudrulu ka balrulane, kikay ngidadarepeli, masalruaku lriarakay madu kaulay.
Paelrelrenga drosa ka kodrolo ka balrolane, kikay ngidadarepeli, masalroako lriarakay mado kaolay.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: Naw pelaelanga ki talragili kela langay, lrimaka paikaduaduay su?
Naw pelaelanga ki talragili kela langay, lrimaka paikadoadoay so?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: Ikatumane! nau kivala ku taydrusane paralubu musuane.
Ikatomane! nao kivala ko taydrosane paralobo mosoane.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: Abuala dreela! kialangalangay kay laimay kay talrupunu.
Aboala dreela! kialangalangay kay laimay kay talropono.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: Ku vaeva ku laimay tulru ka iday si malrimale, lukatulru kudrulu ka balrulane.
Ko vaeva ko laimay tolro ka iday si malrimale, lokatolro kodrolo ka balrolane.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: Lringuvaevaku langay ala baadhaili ku baavane.
Lringovaevako langay ala baadhaili ko baavane.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: Saabaw, nau, langay amiamiaku ku culuku si nipukamangulane ka butulu.
Saabaw, nao, langay amiamiako ko coloko si nipokamangolane ka botolo.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: Pakanaelrenga kilangay ku aga. yakayana kay tana ka tingipura?
Pakanaelrenga kilangay ko aga. yakayana kay tana ka tingipora?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: Mathariri, ala baadhaili pakavaevaili, lukabibilrilinga naulangaynga ku aga.
Mathariri, ala baadhaili pakavaevaili, lokabibilrilinga naolangaynga ko aga.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: Mathariri, nau paralubu musuane pulumasane, kikay malrimale ka balrulane.
Mathariri, nao paralobo mosoane polomasane, kikay malrimale ka balrolane.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
